sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import "../css/Interests.css" import bitcoin from "../Images/bitcoin.jpeg" import food from "../Images/food.jpeg" import burger_food from "../Images/burger_food.jpeg" import rave from "../Images/rave_image.jpeg" export default function Interests(){ return

INTERESTS

I love music and like going out to dance music events/festivals, as covid slowed this down I'm happy we are making a return. Recently Iâ€™ve bridged the gap during lockdown by following Boiler Room Sets and Continental GT Steppers ðŸ¤Ÿ.
I have been involved in competitive gymnastics the age of 7 and have been coaching since 15. I enjoy competition and im always up for trying something new and exciting. I mainly keep up with NBA and UFC, but i watch many more and love big sporting events like the olympics.
Immersive experiences fascinate me, from VR to theatre shows. Designed experiences from Secret Cinema, Gingerline, and Bompass & Parr are some of my favourites. Recently, I've found the work of SURREAL's virtual event platform super innovative and interesting.
I have been following crypto currency from 2017 and and i amazed by how blockchains/tangle technolgy and digital coins/tokens will have a huge impact on the way money is stored in the future aswell as how busniess will allow their customers to connect in better ways.
}
